snippet: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have become major residential landowners in the Bay Area, and some complain that they are hurting neighborhoods by not keeping all of their properties in good repair.
lead_paragraph: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac have become major residential landowners in the Bay Area, and some complain that they are hurting neighborhoods by not keeping all of their properties in good repair.

headline.seo: Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac Are Criticized for Bay Area Properties in Disrepair
